name: Expanding Snake
description:
Every time you score a point, a new point and obstacle appear in the playing area. Every 12 points, the playing area gets larger. If you take too long to get to the point, it changes location and a new obstacle is created.

You can navigate the menu using WASD/arrowkeys + Enter or mouse.

In game controls:

  • arrowkeys/WASD to move,
  • ESC/P to pause,
  • R to restart.

High score and saved options are stored in /AppData/LocalLow/. You can change game speed, sprites/color presets, resolution and game & music volume.

Playable on Windows, Mac and Linux. I have tested it only on Windows though.

Made with Unity engine. The game size is massively oversized compared to what it should be, but there's not much I can do about it.

This is more of a learning experience for me than a proper game, but I suppose some snake enthusiasts might have fun playing.
